title: .hack//Quantum
resume: Asumi Aida is a cheerful high school student who lives a parallel  life inside an online fantasy role-playing game called The World R:X.  There her username is Sakuya. While playing together with her classmates  Iori Ikuta (username Tobias) and Eri Etou (username Mary) inside the  game and having an ordinary treasure hunting adventure, they end up  caught in an ominous situation. After an unfortunate encounter with an  elite guild and a mysterious player named Hermit, Etou loses  consciousness and for an unknown reason is unable to wake up.
